website_summaries.verdict: While the experience isn't as polished as the Slingbox, the Vulkano Flow offers an impressive amount of streaming and recording features at an unbeatable price point.
pros: The Vulkano Flow enables users to watch their home cable or satellite service over the Internet from anywhere on almost any computer or mobile platform
It also allows users to record content directly to a computer
It supports PC, Mac, iOS, Android, and BlackBerry platforms
The Flow also offers a Wi-Fi connection to a home router, unlike any placeshifting device we've seen before
cons: The Vulkano Flow provides no Web site access functionality unlike Sling
The Electronic Programming Guide isn't always reliable and we had the beta Mac version of the system's player crash on us a few times
We also wish it had HDMI ports and an editable port assignment for out-of-network access
The mobile apps cost extra, but nowhere near what Slingbox charges

customer_reviews.title: Company no longer exist, stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Stay away, the company no longer provide software updates since 2015. The new IOS11 will not work with this software. I simply lost my unit after 5 years using it because Apple says the software isn't compatible and the company didn't anything to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandry Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Base model that delivers
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool device and a much better value than the competition. So I gave it a try and was impressed. It was not problem to set up and works fairly seamlessly. I was looking for a more base model just to try and this delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. But the company is out of business ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned this since 2012. Loved it. But the company is out of business now, so these dont work any more as they are server dependent. This product should not be allowed to be purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device - far superior to SLINGBOX!
customer_reviews.text: I had a SlingBox but it was pathetic. Vulkano Flow is far superior in picture and quality. The only weakness was this lack of DVR button on the iPad controller but this is easy to overcome using the isntructions below. I am on a DISH DVR VIP722K I have a Vulkano Flow Google TV iPad etc To set up a DVR button on the iPad so you can view your recordings do this for DISH: 1) Press Remote on iPad 2) Press Menu 3) Hold List Button down for 3 seconds. 4) Choose FUTURE PICK 43 to enable the DVR button on the iPad. 5) Hit save. To show the DVR button - just hit LIST. ) Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: SF Guy USF

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Picture
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars if setup hadn't been so difficult. Setup was made difficult by a poorly written manual, i.e. it referred to passwords without telling WHAT passwords...... Direct TV, wireless router or Vulkano password. But the picture is great and THAT is the finished product. When I'm on my home wi-fi, there is no lag, buffering, or picture quality issues.... it's gorgeous HD quality. If you can overlook the minor setup frustration, it's a better bargain than the Slingbox at twice the price. I'll post more reviews as I use the Vulkano more and see how it holds up electronically.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Junkie Joe

customer_reviews.title: No company support and out of date
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to buy this an it had excellent reviews. It seems the company has moved on to other things, and are not supporting this product anymore. It was last updated to use X8 on the Mac and I could not get it to work with my wireless router. I am going to return it an look for another solution. I suggest you find something else too.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaBoy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best thing I've bought in a long time. Plug the unit into an ethernet port or use the built in wireless, plug the cable and tv into the Vulkano, and you're wathching your cable anywhere. You do need to download the client software for it to work at [...]. Support included iPhone, Blackberry, Android, MAC, and PC. As far as installation goes, it was very simple. Download the software from the site and follow the wizard. There wasn't even a need to mess with my router. A+!!
customer_reviews.author: SlyDawg

customer_reviews.title: As smooth as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: This device went in without a hitch. I did need to set the IR channel on my Dish Network box to channel 1 and I did need to open the appropriate ports on the router. After that, the wizard took me through with little problem. I did call tech support because I had not realized about the IR channel issue. Tech support was courteous and knowledgeable. I got a hold of a human being in record time. The software works flawlessly. I did not get the unit with the DVR, instead relying on the Dish Network DVR. I'm anticipating viewing my recorded shows wherever work takes me in whatever time zone I'm in.
customer_reviews.author: Alan King

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product for watching TV over the internet
customer_reviews.text: After two burnt slingbox units I bought this Vulkano Flow unit today. Setup was easy even though the documentation provided is bad. Don't understand why companies like this can't provide good setup information for the common man. The unit worked well with my verizon fios tv and internet. The remote control looks identical to my actual remote. The video looks pretty good on the computer. The recording capability is good eventhough I haven't used it. I like the unit.
customer_reviews.author: abejo

customer_reviews.title: very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Works great out of the box and also on 2 iPads, iPOD Touch, android phone and 3 home PC's. The Apple and android devices required $12.95 apps-well worth it. Also I ordered the Vulkano Flow on Sunday and received it 3 days later on Wed via free Super Saver Shipping. I connected it to my TIVO Premiere with component cables and the TIVO remains connected to my tv with HDMI at ths same time! Easy 5 min setup and a great picture displayed on all devices mentioned. I have in the past owned a Slingbox 0riginal, but the Monsoon Vulkano unit is superior and less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: AZTOMMY

customer_reviews.title: TV junkies delight
customer_reviews.text: This was a slam dunk purchase ! Save your money and buy the vulkano ,I don't know how well the sling box works but the vulkano flow works great! The better your internet connection the better it works, which is to be expected. I have direct TV and duplicates anything I can do or watch from my recliner. Its suppose to be wireless but I can't figure it out so I just leave the ethernet connected to my router., no big deal. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Vulkano Flow
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an option to watch my recorded items while traveling on the road for my job. This fit the bill nicely. The cost was well worth the price, even though the iPhone/iPad app to watch your Vulkano will run you $13. When I was able to watch a PPV fight on my iPhone, it was well worth it. No more recording it and trying to sequester myself until I get home...
customer_reviews.author: Project71

customer_reviews.title: Vulkano hot like magma
customer_reviews.text: Set up took a little time so make sure you read the directions carefully. There are no instructions to point the IR sensors to the IR on the cable box, which is why the remote wasn't working for me. Called tech support and the dude had a major attitude. Other than that, the product is incredible. I have the a player on 3 computers and it works perfectly. The mobile is good as long as you can get a decent signal. I would highly recommend getting this product. Cable companies won't like to hear this, but you won't need to buy another cable box and TV for your bedroom, just get Vulkano.
customer_reviews.author: eggmok

customer_reviews.title: We really like it!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, can watch TV anywhere in my house on any computer, or outside by the pool watching racing on Sundays. Wife uses it all the time on her computer down stairs vs. installing another cable and another cable box. Been using it for over 3 months now, only thing we notice it needs to be rebooted\restarted by pulling the power every week or so.
customer_reviews.author: John Bryant

customer_reviews.title: No DVR Control
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly satisfied with this product as it does allow me to watch my home television and change the channels. I have installed the software several times and have not been able to get control of the DVR. I'm a fairly tech savvy guy and, as I was told by Monsoon's customer service, "It's not rocket science." (rude!) So, I guess the better conclusion is that either I got a lemon or it just doesn't work that well. Home television is AT&T U-Verse, Mac desktop.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Relish

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: I have had my volkano for over 5 years now and couldn't be happier. My daughter lives in the UK and we can still watch TV together. I DVR our favorite shows during the week and Sunday is still our together time. Best investment.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: What a great solution!
customer_reviews.text: I am not very tech savvy, so I did need to have help setting up this product,and when I needed assistance I called their help number,andI was connected quickly and received accurate information on how to resolve my issue. I LOVE the ability to view my TV stations as I travel to other states!! I did also purchase the APPLE TV, which allows me to connect wirelessly, and that makes it a snap!! I would recommnend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Miller

customer_reviews.title: bandwidth
customer_reviews.text: The products works great but there is a hitch. For this product to work well you must have at least 2mbps UPLOAD speed (let me restate 2mbps UPLOAD speed) for it to work correctly on any high action programs without excessive pixilating (whitch I called the flash gordon effect (due to people running have a comet like tail)). I could not locate anywhere that this was the UPLOAD speed needed, but found out on personal experience. After increasing my braodband speed to 2mbps UPLOAD speed it worked GREAT. Sorry for any typing or gramical errors. I normally never write a review but I wanted other people who buy this product to know about this highly needed information.
customer_reviews.author: gopackgo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this based on some reviews here and elsewhere that said setup was painful. It took about a half hour and I'm guessing the process has been worked on. I had no trouble setting it up entirely wireless. This thing just works. I have dsl on the questionable side of being fast enough, 3mbps down, 1 mbps up, but there seems to be plenty of bandwidth. Using the iphone app even on sprint's slower 3g network works well. It takes about a minute to connect and buffer, but playback is smooth. Be prepared to guzzle data though.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the way I can watch my home tv from my phone anywhere. So great when it works. I find it loses connection a lot. I don't think I've ever watched more than 5 minutes without a loss, then a reconnect. I don't know if it is the current state of technology, since I never had a sling box or any other similar item to compare it too. Also the Phone app should be free (ripoff).
customer_reviews.author: Joe User

customer_reviews.title: Good Alternative
customer_reviews.text: This was a good alternative to the higher priced non-wifi Slingbox, hooked it up at my parents house with no problem at all...The need to pay for iPhone/Ipad app at 12.95 kinda stinks but I'm still saving $ over the sling box. Also wish I looked at versions with more storage but for what I wanted this fit the bill..Hopefully the app menu choices gets better with upgrades....Happy with qaulity from box on 2nd floor to wifi connection on 1st floor and over wifi at my house or mobile device..I can't complain with the picture....overall happy with purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Pineapple girl

customer_reviews.title: Works Great With My Ipad
customer_reviews.text: Works very nicely with my Ipad now that I connect the Vulkano Flow to my network using WIFI. I initially connected the Vulkano Flow to my network via a network cable and the Ipad app would work for a few seconds and then halt while it buffered the video stream. Once I connected the Vulkano Flow via WIFI the Ipad app had no problem displaying the video. Amazon delivery of the Vulkano Flow was on time...as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Jim From Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great streaming device
customer_reviews.text: This Flow is being used in a television station to broadcast video and has been connected to our remote machine for a week with no problems.. A++++ tech support is also great if you have any questions. I will be buying another Flow in the near future... see KZTC TV san diego if you want to see the video quality. Great item.. Thanks to Jsat.tv in Bangkok Thailand..
customer_reviews.author: TrailerParkBob

customer_reviews.title: Better value than SlingMedia
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several Slingbox products in the past and put up with their manufacturing defects because I didn't know of any other products that allowed me to do the "place shifting" thing. I bought my first Vulkano about 1.5 years ago and it's still going strong. I like the look and feel of the Slingbox app better but I think the Vulkano unit is technically superior. Vulkano has built-in wi-fi capability while you have to get a third party wi-fi dongle for the SOLO. I bought my second Vulkano to replace another dead SOLO unit.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Marginal Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: It worked well but even with HDMI connection does not transmit higher then 720p. This results in sometimes marginal picture quality and fuzziness. I returned and have been using the Slingbox M1 which has been amazing. Extremely crisp picture quality with 1080 streaming. People don't believe that we are watching the game over a network.
customer_reviews.author: disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: I previously wrote a positive review. I have enjoyed this device over the last 18 months. It's dead now. Fortunately, I paid a little more at the two-year protection plan. I received a refund, and will look for something else to purchase. This is off the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Trout

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely outstanding product. Easy setup, great features, need I say more. It's possible to record programs from 714 miles away when the cable system you have does not the same channels. Being able to watch the Chicago Bears in Arkansas makes it worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Streaming quality much better than slingbox
customer_reviews.text: To me picture quality is the most important thing and the vulkano is much better than slingbox in this respect. If you are trying to decide between this and slingbox it is a no brainer. Much less expensive. A cool feater i did not expect is to be able to record directly to your computer but you can also record your live stream on you ipad or tablet for later viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Stream TV to my iPhone just fine
customer_reviews.text: - This device works just as advertised. - Setup was quick and easy to follow. Firewall and router configurations were not a problem - Works best with a strong WiFi signal (weak signal sometimes hampers channel changing) - Note about using over 3G/4G connection- streaming this media chews up a lot of data so keep an eye on your usage if you do not have an unlimited plan - I would recommend this device
customer_reviews.author: warreneg22

customer_reviews.title: Yippeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
customer_reviews.text: They have finally gotten these streamers right.this one works like a charm.and it works wireless to.and it controls my Directv dvr.its amazing how good the reception was.now when im on the road im no longer stuck with those routine channels that the hotels provide.i have the NFL SUNDAY TICKET.so it was a please to have access to the games that sunday
customer_reviews.author: DALion

customer_reviews.title: good product, android app expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Video over the internet works great. Setup was simple. Only problem I have is the android player that works with this device is expensive, $14. Why are they charging at all? I purchased an internet player for my cable an wasn't expecting to have to spend more on top of purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Hlmflyer

customer_reviews.title: exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This thing is truly awesome. Was really surprised by its capabilities considering I had no idea what it was really capable of until I bought it and hooked it up. I'm leaving for deployment soon and was told about the slingbox, but after reading some reviews concerning hardware unreliability, I decided to go with the Vulkano Flow instead as a low-risk, high-reward purchase (cheaper product). I'll probably end up upgrading to the higher end ones with HDMI later on, but this works for now. My internet speeds at home are around 5 mbps upload so I've had no issues with lag over a wireless connection.
customer_reviews.author: KCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Vulkano Flow - Easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Vulkano Flow because the price was right versus a competitive brand and because it had the option to run on a Wireless network which was very advantageous for me due to the placement of my television control box. I've had to call Monsoon support to match with my specific cable DVR and they were highly responsive and awesome. I've had the unit for 3 weeks now and have been able to enjoy the television while traveling and killing time while waiting for others, etc. I typically run the player on either a Mac or and iPhone. Both work great.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to sling box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since it came with a built in Wifi and was much cheaper than slingbox. It does all the same things. It was really easy to setup. When I travel or am away from the house, I use this to watch recorded shows, as well as live TV. Regarding live T.V.: it is on a delay, just like if you were watch on a DVR. Everything always depends on your rate of connectivity to access the internet.....I've used it on my cell plan and it worked great (both 3G and 4G).
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVER
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else, I wanted to be able to watch my hometown sports teams after moving, so I initially looked at slingbox, saw terrible reviews, saw this guy was half the price and took the plunge. THE VULKANO IS AWESOME!! It has been working perfectly, it is absolutely trivial to set up, and the android app for it runs beautifully as well. I have zero negative things to say, would absolutely recommend this. At $99 it was less than half as much as a slingbox and it works better.
customer_reviews.author: TB12

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, but still confused
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great product, but you still have to pay the $12.99 to use it on your phone or mobile device. I got it to work on my home computer, but still struggling to get it to work anywhere else. Not sure why it is so difficult, but if I ever figure it out, it'll work great!
customer_reviews.author: SAL7979

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Streaming quality is great on good internet connection. We have to manually set the quality at 720, and that greatly improved the video. Also, did not have my cable box in the list, but a quick search on their site gave me an alternative model number.
customer_reviews.author: wgeoff

customer_reviews.title: Arrived DOA. No solution!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my Vulkano arrived DOA. I contacted Monsoon's tech service, but they couldn't do anything to make it work. It's a shame since I've been pretty happy with my Hava Platinum for 3 years. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan P.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work & returned.
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions and called customer support and they informed it was a hardware issue. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: FatwalletFan

customer_reviews.title: Very Buggy
customer_reviews.text: The video and audio have a tendency to pause, skip and freeze. I know it's not my laptop or wifi--both play Netflix streaming HD movies without a hitch at all. If I had it to do over, I'd try the Slingbox. Thought I'd save $50 -- oh well.
customer_reviews.author: John Stebbins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and works great
customer_reviews.text: This device works great. Can watch TV that it is attached to from my computer anywhere I have internet connection. I can even watch recorded show on my DVR from anywhere. Very convenient to hook computer up to TV in living room and watch a TV recorded on DVR in bedroom. Easy to setup and works great.
customer_reviews.author: LORI J

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: Going to compare this with the Slingbox Pro HD, since I have both. Pros: Vulkano is much cheaper. Wifi built in, big plus App is cheaper ( App for both box should be free, since you have to have the box to use the app and only 1 viewer at one time) Cons When streaming over verizon 4G, can't get over 1900kbps ( average 4g speed is 15mbps ) ( Home upload speed is 25mpbs, verizon fios) No web broswer viewing, like slingbox.com Slingbox remote is easier to use. Over picture quality on both box is good, using component connection on both box,
customer_reviews.author: Prime

customer_reviews.title: Vulkano Flow
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from Amazon US for delivery and use in the UK. Much cheaper than the same on Amazon UK - which is really stupid these days - and a lot cheaper than Slingbox. Took a bit of an effort to set up in the wireless link but seems to work more consistently with ethernet link. So far have not been able to access HD feed as the Sky HD box does not offer component link for which need to buy HD Fury or the like. But SD picture quality is very good. Have not been able to use the remote control feature to actually record on the Sky HD box, which is a pity!
customer_reviews.author: vkb

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: When everything works, the picture quality is very solid. However, it's not a stable app on the iPhone, and you can't rely on it for on-the-go viewing. If you get a good wi-fi connection, it's very good and I'm pleased with it. They're slow to update firmware and software, so don't buy it expecting a bunch of new features. I think it took 3-4 months for iPhone 5 support. Still, it's decent, just not great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this over Slingbox because it connects wirelessly to your router. Slingbox does not. This alow you to set it up at the DVR if your DVR is not next to your router. Something i deeded. Works great too. No problems. Service questions during set up were promptly answered too using the toll free customer service number.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Vulkano Flow for my son to watch soccer remotely (not living at home anymore) and he cannot get Fox Soccer on his cable. I even have relations in UK watching my DirecTV occasionally. The unit works just as advertised, easy to install and set up. Highly recommend. Also, pleasantly surprised to find that once you purchase the $12.99 app for phone/tablet you can install on multiple devices (with the same google login)with single purchase, not purchase per device, great.
customer_reviews.author: signer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this thing! Works just as advertised. Owned it for about a year now and no problems whatsoever. I chose the Vulkano because I heard horrible things about their competitor, Slingbox, who's transistors apparently consistently burn out after 1 year of use. Installing the machine on the network was a little confusing, but only because I'm a dope when it comes to software. Got it running within 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gamage

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have it connected to Direct Tv and use it wirelessly with my Droid. Much cheaper then the Slingbox and works the same. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: sped01

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise
customer_reviews.text: For $100, I couldn't have asked for more. Only on day one so far but the ease of install and video quality/functionality of this device is amazing. Exactly what I was looking for and no slingbox BS to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Stickman33

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but had to had to use learn function to get remote to work (Dish 805 PVR). Streaming to my IPad works great after purchasing IPad App $12.99. Having trouble streaming to my laptop....picture but sometimes no sound. Maybe because home upload speed restricted to DSL max.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Sedgwick

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Device for Viewing TV On The Go
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of trouble with getting this device connected and eventually returned it. I was very disappointed with the customer service support.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Works Well - Just As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I use this to stream TV from a cable box to my Android phone and Android tablet and it works quite well. Would have been nice if it had HDMI but not a deal breaker, having built-in WiFi makes up for it. Does the same thing as SlingBox for a fraction of the price, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: My home TV is always with me
customer_reviews.text: What a great feeling! Where ever I stay, I have my home TV with me. I control my home TV set with my iPhone, iPad and my laptop. The only downside was the installation. Had to call a technitian to synchronize the Vulkano for the first time ($100). It was worth it. The photo was taken in Europe
customer_reviews.author: Lippi

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: had one of these for a couple of years and it worked good, It finally broke down and tried to purchase this unit but it was DOA.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  Cheaper than Slingbox.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Cheaper than Slingbox. iPhone app is more expensive tho. I've been using this for 2 years with no regrets
customer_reviews.author: Daekwan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Allows me to access my home satellite ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Allows me to access my home satellite box from my tablet or computer where ever there is Wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Acspartan12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave up after 3rd Slingbox. This unit works very well but the remote controls are funky.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: It is working fine. Initially, it gave me trouble with the sound. However, you have to buy the apps for smartphones and tablets. The apps are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Prakash P. Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Just Works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 14 months ago and it's just as good (and cheaper) than a Slingbox. I wish the app would look like my Tivo remote, but other than that, this works perfectly. I've used it on 4g but wifi is the best. Since I've had it I only had to reset it (unplug it) once when I couldn't access it away from home. Not sure if it was my network or what, but that's been my only hitch. Tv on the go is great and since I'm the only one home, changing the channels won't upset anyone that's at the house. It's also great that I can schedule recordings thru Tivo when I forget. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: W. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: I recommand this item,, it's work anywhere , very easy to see your tv. Any place, nice picture clear and fine, watching your own channel
customer_reviews.author: Rider77

customer_reviews.title: Vulkano Flow
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this thing. It took less than 30 minutes to get set-up and operating. Optested it by tethering both my laptop PC and the Mrs' MacBook to my Android phone over 3G and it worked like a champ! I can't wait to try it at the lake this weekend, no more missing my regular TV when I am off relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: Ed G

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Had a bit of an issue getting the initial setup correct, but with their tech supports assistance, was quickly resolved and I've had NO problems whatsoever on my iPhone 4, iMac, or PCs (both at home and work). Oh yea, did I mention they asked what time I would be home for them to assist me with my problem and they would call ME? That's good stuff there, huh! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Really great device
customer_reviews.text: Use this for streaming tv to my iPad and computers. Why pay for more cable boxes? I stream tv with this around the house. Haven't been able to access outside my house but it's not a pressing need.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, basic gadget
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Low price point makes up for lack of HDMI port.
customer_reviews.author: Mez

customer_reviews.title: Better than Sling Box
customer_reviews.text: I had an older Sling Box that died and could not get tech support from Sling Box, so after reading reviews decided to get the Volkano. Hands down better picture quality with the Volkano than the Sling Box. No regrets here.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ehle

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: First of its kind that I purchased. I think it does a good job for what unit has to do. Was able to watch ballgames at work in places we had no tv.
customer_reviews.author: James Willis

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Available for Mobile T.V. Streaming!
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for over 6 weeks now and it works flawlessly! Simple set up and great app functionality for both IPhone 4S and Android (Motorola Atrix 2). I've used the SlingBox for Dish Network and that was hot garbage! Only worked never!!! Get the Vulkano Flow if you want mobile television that works!
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: works great! good replacement for my old device.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old mobile device after it stopped working. ( shall remain unnamed). The Vulkano has lived up to my expectations and actually works better than the unnamed device. I did have some issues doing the initial setup and called customer service. We worked out the problem and I have had no issues since. Good device for less than the competition.
customer_reviews.author: jerseyshore

customer_reviews.title: Not wroking!!!!!!!!!:(
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 2 months, then it stop working, I would never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Herrera

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Vulkano when I went to Spain for a year. The image is not crystal clear but I does it's job. I am able to follow my favorite shows and I still can use my On demand Tv. Great product. Don't expect HD tv though.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, because a non IT user did
customer_reviews.text: Works great from install to useability. Control your tv from afar, for a great price. This is my second install and the first is still working great after 1 year, so I bought another to be able to watch sports from another zip code, as no blackout for my local team. Get it and enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Absolute

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Quite impressed with the Flow. It does take a bit to get it hooked up, and I did have to make 1 call to tech support to respond to a question, but after an hour or so, was watching tv on our lap top (Windows 7). Have yet to try it out farther away from home using wifi.
customer_reviews.author: gjportland

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work as advertised. WIFI stopped working after 10 minutes. The channel changer did not work, even though I had the correct settings for the set top box. The recording function did not work. I uninstalled and reinstalled twice just to double check my work. Nothing changed. Furthermore, both of the technical support numbers, the one on the website and the other in the printed material that came with the box, were not in service. Advertised to work with Mac, but not mine. Sent back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Slingbox
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe their "stream at low speeds." However, bought the Slingbox M1 and it works like a charm with low speed internet overseas. Spend the extra $75, you will be happy you did. Their software needs updating...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been great! Setup was super easy and connecting to it on my computer was even easier. Streaming no problem on my Mac. The software could use some tweaks though.
customer_reviews.author: Julia D.

customer_reviews.title: Get this for your iPad
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I use it everyday with my iPad 2 and it works perfectly. It allows you to control your cable box remotely and access all it's features such as your DVR and on demand video. I love being able to watch whatever I want wherever I am. The built in wifi on the device is a great feature that the slingbox lacks. It works well and is easy to set up. The app on the iPad and iPhone is cheap, simple and works perfectly. Overall this is an essential piece of hardware to own if you own an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan2258

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is like it was described. Excellent servive and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Tested on Chile / VTR Provider
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of hardware, worked like a charm with my Motorola DCX3400 box. Had to check for some IR combinations in order to use all the set-top-box functionalities. I'm also using the IPad and IPhone apps, great quality but the remotes are less than satisfactory, the PC software remote is much better (though far from perfect). In all I would recommend this hardware, the video quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Patricio D. Anguita

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Workable and streaming smoothly. Easy to set up. Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Kan Ming

customer_reviews.title: Vulkano is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical a out vulkano, and now I love it, I can stream my soccer games from my cell or computer. I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: This does an very good job. the only problem i had was setting it up but with a little help from the tech people it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: wifi wouldn't work
customer_reviews.text: I got the device and was excited to use it over the slingbox pro hd, unfortunately the wireless would not work. The wired portion worked fine but the tv i planned on using it on was not in the same room as the router. I set it up directly connected to the router but as soon as the ethernet cable was removed the connection would be lost and it was not able to be regained. If the wifi worked I'd give this item a great rating but it just wouldn't work for me so I'm returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: software is crap
customer_reviews.text: Software is buggy, Online remote does nothing so if you want to change the channel your just screwed. Works for what I use it for but just barely and NOTHING like the advertising claims.
customer_reviews.author: Imez Ruez

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to sling box
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but the resolution is bad. Another problem is that it doesn't work with my old wireless router. I had to buy a new router. I recommend this device because it costs a lot less than Sling Box.
customer_reviews.author: David Yang

customer_reviews.title: I had a better experience with this device compared with another similar pdt
customer_reviews.text: I had a better experience with this device compared with another similar pdt. Even have chance to do recording on the computer. But viewing on computer can be sluggish and clarity is compromised.
customer_reviews.author: roseazam

customer_reviews.title: OK, but...
customer_reviews.text: I received this unit in France within 2 days : bravo. The unit itself is OK : I regret : - the remote control is OK except the "back" Key for my source device - there is not enough control on the bandwidth to be used.
customer_reviews.author: nialap

customer_reviews.title: area problem
customer_reviews.text: product would probably work in other areas ,however,i had buffering problems, Constant rebooting was a drag.product didn't performed to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Facenbaker

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: WHEN WE GOT THE PRODUCT IT WAS SOMEWHAT TRICKY TO CONFIGURE TO OUR ROUTER. AFTER A FEW ATTEMPTS WE GOT IT DONE AND EVERYTHING WORKED VERY WELL. VULCANO IS A HANDY TOOL FOR SURE, LETTING YOU WATCH YOUR HOME PROGRAMMING ANYWHERE. WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: wall5467

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Thought it Would Be
customer_reviews.text: To say this was a disappointing gift purchase would be the understatement of the new year. The device was extremely complicated to set up, required a lot of time with technical support and we still can't access our TV programming from outside of our wireless network.
customer_reviews.author: Marketingmind

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy
customer_reviews.text: Works fine over wifi at home. Doesn't work over 3G or 4g with iPhone or iPad 3. Called support and they told me they don't know what the problem is so oh well sorry. Support doesn't have any other answer
customer_reviews.author: Wb

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend. Sling box does a better Job at streaming.
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Purchase Vulkano instead of Sling Box
customer_reviews.text: I have had Sling Box for over 5 years and considered the service support as the worst of any technical company I have witness and associated (I am a Systems Engineer/Physicist). Sling Box's service is almost like being "BLACKMAILED" for technical assistance. I purchased the Vulkano Flow and have enjoyed better service and support without pulling out by credit card for assistance. I only paid $84.00 for the Vulkano Flow and it performance has been better than the Sling Box Pro. I suggest that when you can not get adequate assistance from the Sling Box Technical Staff PURCHASE A VULKANO PRODUCT TO REPLACE THE SLING BOX and fight against "Planned Obsolescence" and "poor technical service" exhibited by Sling Box!
customer_reviews.author: James Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: the product decription says you can use it on al ...
customer_reviews.text: the product decription says you can use it on al devices including big screen TV but now that I have it, I wrote the to ask how to use it on my big screen and the only answeared " you cant" very dissappointing
customer_reviews.author: patoazorin

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: This Vulkano Flow was installed in Brazil. It worked well in my country, but in San Francisco, CA, the image was very poor.
customer_reviews.author: PCRunner

customer_reviews.title: Greeat product
customer_reviews.text: Very simple set up and great quality. Ease of use if off the charts and very affordable for what you get. A+
customer_reviews.author: D. Kochanski

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Bought Vulkano Flow to replace a Slingbox Solo that died due to capacitor problems (Google it). Received the Flow today and plugged it in. No power light - dead on arrival. I'm returning it to Amazon and will try one more unit. Can't anyone build a reliable placeshifter?
customer_reviews.author: tjgallan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy Vulkano flow - waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I bought Vulkano flow 2 months ago. It worked fine for about 1.5 months until I can not return it anymore. then it stopped working. Spent 1 hour on the phone with a very rude technical support that did not fix the problem and refused to replace the item. I gave up and just sent it back to Amazon returns hoping to get at least something back. Do not buy it - waste of money and the most important time.
customer_reviews.author: BLP

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute all time worst product that I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy. Wifi works great
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy. Wifi works great. 3G LTE NOT SO MUCH. Not sure if it's my Time Warner modem or what. Called Monsoon with no help. Time Warner came out and said their moden may not allow the LTE to work. Hit or miss when not using WIFI.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Saupe

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: The player just didn't work. It turned on but could not perform the TV streaming functions its meant to do. The player was faulty; that has nothing to do with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: A. You

product_meta.title: Vulkano Flow Mobile Device for Viewing TV on the Go
product_meta.description:
Vulkano Flow let's you Watch & Control your home TV service (Cable, Satellite) from anywhere in the world over Wi-Fi or 3G on any mobile device. Watch TV on a PC, Mac, iPad, Tablets, or Smartphones like the iPhone, Android, or BlackBerry. Record favorite TV shows to a PC or Mac hard drive to watch at a later date. Watch your TV anytime, anywhere on any mobile device.

AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Vulkano FLOW is the perfect mobile accessory to watch your TV anywhere in the world. All you need is the Vulkano FLOW, a cable or satellite set top box, a home network and wifi or 3g connection. You can watch and control any TV channel or your recorded content on your DVR anywhere in the world or at home. It also has DVR features including an Electronic Program Guide (EPG) so you can schedule TV recordings to a PC or Mac, then watch them when you want to. Carrying your TV with you and watching it in any room in the house or on the deck or from anywhere in the world has never been easier and more enjoyable. FLOW connects to your home network wirelessly and seamlessly. And setup and installation are very easy.

Use your iPod or smartphone to watch live TV A sleek, stylish and easy to use. View larger
The perfect mobile accessory to watch your TV anywhere in the world ALL-IN-ONE WAY TO WATCH VIDEO ANYWHERE
Vulkano is a sleek and stylish all-in-one digital video recorder that connects to your TV set-top box and enables a complete TV and Internet media experience on smartphones, iPads, PCs, Macs, and your big screen TV. Vulkano allows you to experience live or recorded TV, videos, photos and music on whichever screen you prefer, when you want it. Imagine having the video recording functionality of a TiVo, Slingbox, and Roku, plus the ability to stream video to all your favorite devices, all in a single box--for a fraction of the price.

Every Vulkano comes with an electronic program guide (EPG) that lets users interact with a continuously updated TV guide displaying current and upcoming programming so you will never miss another sports game or favorite TV show. Control your TV as if you were sitting on the sofa with your remote control in hand.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Vulkano FLOW DVR, power adapter, Quick Start Guide, RJ-45 Ethernet cable, IR Blaster cable, component cable, composite cable.



See more
feature_bullets: Watch & control your TV from anywhere in the world over Wi-Fi or 3G on any mobile device
Record TV shows to your PC or Mac hard drive
Pause, rewind or fast forward live or recorded TV
Stream TV wirelessly around your home; watch TV on your deck, by the pool, or laying in bed with your iPad
Easy to set up use; wireless set up makes installation a breeze

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars261 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
